lead_paragraph: LEAD: WHEN it went into effect in January, it was called the most comprehensive ban in the nation against smoking in commercial transportation. A California law, it forbade smoking on airline flights that began and ended in the state and on all trains and buses operating in the state, regardless of their points of origin and destination.
